title: Example Challenge
description: The flag is flag{example_challenge_1}. Edit chal-seed-data.json to add your own challenges.

title: Example Challenge Revenge
description: What does the OS in OSINT stand for?

title: Attachment Example
description:
To add attachments to files, place the files in public/nocommit/challenges/ and reference them in the challenge JSON. 
The directory /nocommit/challenges can be configured in /config/constants.ts. 

Try adding a chal.txt in the correct directory. The flag is the correct directory path.
